actions.recommendation: High systolic blood pressure noted - please focus on lifestyle changes. A waist to height ratio of more than 50% is associated with a significantly increased risk for chronic disease and adverse cardiovascular events. Focus on losing cm around the waist
Your homocysteine is higher than ideal at 13umol/l. You can reduce this by supplementing with methylated B vitamins eg. Stellar NeuroXcel & recheck the level in 6 months. Aim for <7 umol/l.
Matthew needs to make some significant lifestyle/dietary change. This will have a knock on effect on so many areas of your life and well being.
